00033 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Function: setHighlight()
00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 void DiagramConnectionEndPoint::setHighlight(HighlightMode mode)
00037 {
00038     switch (mode)
00039     {
00040     case HIGHLIGHT_OFF:
00041         {
00042             setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 1));
00043             break;
00044         }
00045 
00046     case HIGHLIGHT_ALLOWED:
00047         {
00048             setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
00049             break;
00050         }
00051 
00052     case HIGHLIGHT_HOVER:
00053         {
00054             setPen(QPen(Qt::red, 2));
00055             break;
00056         }
00057     }
00058 }

00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 // Function: setDirection()
00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void DiagramConnectionEndPoint::setDirection(QVector2D const& dir)
00096 {
00097     // Determine the rotation based on the new direction.
00098     if (qFuzzyCompare(dir, QVector2D(0.0f, -1.0f)))
00099     {
00100         setRotation(0.0);
00101     }
00102     else if (qFuzzyCompare(dir, QVector2D(0.0f, 1.0f)))
00103     {
00104         setRotation(180.0);
00105     }
00106     else if (qFuzzyCompare(dir, QVector2D(1.0f, 0.0f)))
00107     {
00108         setRotation(90.0);
00109     }
00110     else if (qFuzzyCompare(dir, QVector2D(-1.0f, 0.0f)))
00111     {
00112         setRotation(-90.0);
00113     }
00114 
00115     dir_ = dir;
00116 }
00117 
00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 // Function: isDirectionFixed()
00120 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 bool DiagramConnectionEndPoint::isDirectionFixed() const
00122 {
00123     // The end point direction is not fixed by default.
00124     return false;
00125 }
00126 
00127 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 // Function: getDirection()
00129 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 QVector2D const& DiagramConnectionEndPoint::getDirection() const
00131 {
00132     return dir_;
00133 }
